id: Here Are All 24 Netflix Titles That Are Leaving In November
paragraph:
Better start binge-watching!
        But don't worry, they're giving us lots of good stuff like Sixteen Candles, Doctor Strange, and Good Will Hunting!1. Cruel Intentions2. Cruel Intentions 2 3. Cruel Intentions 34.
